{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# More on unit operations"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "BioSTEAM includes a wide range of [unit operation](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/units.html) models and cost correlations adapted from design textbooks and literature [[1-5]](#References). Essential unit operations such as [storage tanks](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/StorageTank.html), [pumps](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/Pump.html), [heat exchangers](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/HXutility.html), [flash vessels](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/HXutility.html), and [distillation columns](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/Distillation.html) are some of the most rigorously modeled and designed. Design requirements for these essential units are calculated based on design specifications such as operating temperature and pressure, feed conditions, construction material, and degree of separation. These design requirements include, but are not limited to, the heat-transfer area of heat exchangers, the size and thickness of pressure vessels, and number of stages in a distillation column. Other unit operation models are modeled as [splitters](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/Splitter.html) (i.e., a specified fraction of each component entering a unit is separated), and the purchase price is estimated using size factor correlations that are ultimately a function of material flow rates. BioSTEAM chooses purchase price correlations and construction factors based on the design specifications and requirements for each unit operation.\n",
    "\n",
    "For detailed documentation and examples of each unit operation, visit the [units subpackage documentation](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/units/units.html). Here we will highlight key details how a unit operation works by using BioSTEAM's binary distillation column as an example:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Distillation: D1\n",
      "ins...\n",
      "[0] feed\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 349.28 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow (kmol/hr): Water     80\n",
      "                    Methanol  100\n",
      "                    Glycerol  25\n",
      "outs...\n",
      "[0] distillate\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow: 0\n",
      "[1] bottoms_product\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow: 0\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "from biosteam.units import Distillation\n",
    "from thermosteam import Stream, settings\n",
    "\n",
    "# First set the property package through thermosteam\n",
    "settings.set_thermo(['Water', 'Methanol', 'Glycerol'])\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create the feed at the bubble point\n",
    "feed = Stream('feed', flow=(80, 100, 25))\n",
    "bp = feed.bubble_point_at_P()\n",
    "feed.T = bp.T # Feed at bubble point temperature\n",
    "\n",
    "# Create a distillation column and simulate\n",
    "D1 = Distillation('D1', ins=feed,\n",
    "                  outs=('distillate', 'bottoms_product'),\n",
    "                  LHK=('Methanol', 'Water'), # Light and heavy keys\n",
    "                  y_top=0.99, # Light key composition at the distillate\n",
    "                  x_bot=0.01, # Light key composition at the bottoms product\n",
    "                  k=2, # Ration of actual reflux over minimum reflux\n",
    "                  is_divided=True) # Whether the rectifying and stripping sections are divided\n",
    "D1.show()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Before simulating a distillation column, no results are available, streams are empty, and the components are initialized but empty as well:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "{}"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 2,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.design_results"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "{}"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.purchase_costs"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "(<HeatUtility: None>, <HeatUtility: None>)"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 4,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.heat_utilities"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "<PowerUtility: 0 kW, 0 USD/hr>"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 5,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.power_utility"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "All unit operations have the `design_results`, `purchase_costs`, `heat_utilities`, and `power_utility` attributes. The `heat_utilities` attribute is a tuple of [HeatUtility](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/HeatUtility.html) objects and the `power_utility` attribute is a either [PowerUtility](https://biosteam.readthedocs.io/en/latest/PowerUtility.html) object or `None`. Unit operations may also have attributes and components specific to that unit operation. For example, here are few distillation-specific components:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "HXutility: U.1\n",
      "ins...\n",
      "[0] s.1\n",
      "    phase: 'g', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow: 0\n",
      "outs...\n",
      "[0] s.2\n",
      "    phases: ('g', 'l'), T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow: 0\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.condenser"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    },
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "HXutility: U.2\n",
      "ins...\n",
      "[0] s.2\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow: 0\n",
      "outs...\n",
      "[0] s.3\n",
      "    phases: ('g', 'l'), T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      "    flow: 0\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.boiler"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [

     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",

      "Stream: s.4\n",
      " phase: 'g', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      " flow: 0\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.boilup"
   ]
  },

   "outputs": [

     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Stream: s.3\n",
      " phase: 'l', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      " flow: 0\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.condensate"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Stream: s.5\n",
      " phase: 'g', T: 298.15 K, P: 101325 Pa\n",
      " flow: 0\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.precondensate"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "After simulation, the unit operation along with its components will calculate all design results, purchase costs, and utilities:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 11,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Distillation: D1\n",
      "ins...\n",
      "[0] feed\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 76.129 degC, P: 1 atm\n",
      "    composition: Water     0.39\n",
      "                 Methanol  0.488\n",
      "                 Glycerol  0.122\n",
      "                 --------  205 kmol/hr\n",
      "outs...\n",
      "[0] distillate\n",
      "    phase: 'g', T: 64.91 degC, P: 1 atm\n",
      "    composition: Water     0.01\n",
      "                 Methanol  0.99\n",
      "                 --------  100 kmol/hr\n",
      "[1] bottoms_product\n",
      "    phase: 'l', T: 100.06 degC, P: 1 atm\n",
      "    composition: Water     0.754\n",
      "                 Methanol  0.00761\n",
      "                 Glycerol  0.239\n",
      "                 --------  105 kmol/hr\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.simulate()\n",
    "D1.show(T='degC', P='atm', composition=True)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "{'Theoretical feed stage': 9,\n",
       " 'Theoretical stages': 13,\n",
       " 'Minimum reflux': 0.6873794552117438,\n",
       " 'Reflux': 1.3747589104234876,\n",
       " 'Rectifier stages': 15.0,\n",
       " 'Stripper stages': 13.0,\n",
       " 'Rectifier height': 34.660416,\n",
       " 'Stripper height': 31.708416000000003,\n",
       " 'Rectifier diameter': 3.9275517410615417,\n",
       " 'Stripper diameter': 3.3634264808282524,\n",
       " 'Rectifier wall thickness': 0.25,\n",
       " 'Stripper wall thickness': 0.25,\n",
       " 'Rectifier weight': 4794.134870466409,\n",
       " 'Stripper weight': 3739.230285266795}"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 12,

      ]
     },

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "The `results()` method can conviniently present all these results: "
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "metadata": {
    "scrolled": false
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>Distillation</th>\n",
       "      <th>Units</th>\n",
       "      <th>D1</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"3\" valign=\"top\">Cooling water</th>\n",
       "      <th>Duty</th>\n",
       "      <td>kJ/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>-5.11e+06</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Flow</th>\n",
       "      <td>kmol/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.49e+03</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Cost</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.71</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"3\" valign=\"top\">Low pressure steam</th>\n",
       "      <th>Duty</th>\n",
       "      <td>kJ/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>9.49e+06</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Flow</th>\n",
       "      <td>kmol/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>244</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",

       "    </tr>\n",

       "      <th>Reflux</th>\n",
       "      <td>Ratio</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.37</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Rectifier stages</th>\n",
       "      <td></td>\n",
       "      <td>15</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Stripper stages</th>\n",
       "      <td></td>\n",
       "      <td>13</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Rectifier height</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft</td>\n",
       "      <td>34.7</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Stripper height</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft</td>\n",
       "      <td>31.7</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Rectifier diameter</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.93</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Stripper diameter</th>\n",
       "      <td>ft</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.36</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Rectifier wall thickness</th>\n",
       "      <td>in</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.25</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Stripper wall thickness</th>\n",
       "      <td>in</td>\n",
       "      <td>0.25</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Rectifier weight</th>\n",
       "      <td>lb</td>\n",
       "      <td>4.79e+03</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Stripper weight</th>\n",
       "      <td>lb</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.74e+03</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th rowspan=\"6\" valign=\"top\">Purchase cost</th>\n",
       "      <th>Rectifier trays</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.5e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Stripper trays</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>1.28e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Rectifier tower</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>7.62e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Stripper tower</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>6.53e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Condenser</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.02e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Boiler</th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.64e+04</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Total purchase cost</th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <td>USD</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.16e+05</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>Utility cost</th>\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <td>USD/hr</td>\n",
       "      <td>59.8</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "Distillation                                    Units        D1\n",
       "Cooling water       Duty                        kJ/hr -5.11e+06\n",
       "                    Flow                      kmol/hr  3.49e+03\n",
       "                    Cost                       USD/hr      1.71\n",
       "Low pressure steam  Duty                        kJ/hr  9.49e+06\n",
       "                    Flow                      kmol/hr       244\n",
       "                    Cost                       USD/hr      58.1\n",
       "Design              Theoretical feed stage                    9\n",
       "                    Theoretical stages                       13\n",
       "                    Minimum reflux              Ratio     0.687\n",
       "                    Reflux                      Ratio      1.37\n",
       "                    Rectifier stages                         15\n",
       "                    Stripper stages                          13\n",
       "                    Rectifier height               ft      34.7\n",
       "                    Stripper height                ft      31.7\n",
       "                    Rectifier diameter             ft      3.93\n",
       "                    Stripper diameter              ft      3.36\n",
       "                    Rectifier wall thickness       in      0.25\n",
       "                    Stripper wall thickness        in      0.25\n",
       "                    Rectifier weight               lb  4.79e+03\n",
       "                    Stripper weight                lb  3.74e+03\n",
       "Purchase cost       Rectifier trays               USD   1.5e+04\n",
       "                    Stripper trays                USD  1.28e+04\n",
       "                    Rectifier tower               USD  7.62e+04\n",
       "                    Stripper tower                USD  6.53e+04\n",
       "                    Condenser                     USD  2.02e+04\n",
       "                    Boiler                        USD  2.64e+04\n",
       "Total purchase cost                               USD  2.16e+05\n",
       "Utility cost                                   USD/hr      59.8"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 16,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.results()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Note that the units for the design results are in the `_units` dictionary:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 17,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "{'Minimum reflux': 'Ratio',\n",
       " 'Reflux': 'Ratio',\n",
       " 'Rectifier height': 'ft',\n",
       " 'Rectifier diameter': 'ft',\n",
       " 'Rectifier wall thickness': 'in',\n",
       " 'Rectifier weight': 'lb',\n",
       " 'Stripper height': 'ft',\n",
       " 'Stripper diameter': 'ft',\n",
       " 'Stripper wall thickness': 'in',\n",
       " 'Stripper weight': 'lb',\n",
       " 'Height': 'ft',\n",
       " 'Diameter': 'ft',\n",
       " 'Wall thickness': 'in',\n",
       " 'Weight': 'lb'}"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 17,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1._units"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "It is also possible to retrieve design results in another set of units:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 18,
   "metadata": {
    "scrolled": true
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "10.564494796799998"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 18,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "D1.get_design_result('Rectifier height', 'meter')"
   ]
  },
